alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 8:48PM MST until February 16 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow will decrease this evening. Snow will move back in late tonight and Wednesday morning and continue through the day Wednesday. Additional snowfall of 1 to 2 inches tonight and Wednesday, for a storm total of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph could cause blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Judith Gap. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
